DOC.brief_summary: This is a development project involving four different municipalities in Central Norway. The aim is to identify adults with overweight and with an increased risk of developing diabetes mellitus type 2, then to prevent the disease to develop by the means of a behaviour change programme. The programme is group based.
DOC.brief_title: Local Measures to Prevent Diabetes in the VÃ¦rnes Region.
DOC.criteria: Living in Central Norway Find Risc score > 15 Written, informed consent Severe mental disorder Not being able to function in the group programme
